document.full_text: the greek prime minister is considering reshuffling his cabinet to include officials suggested by the opposition if it backs his austerity policies, kathimerini daily wrote without naming sources.
document.title: greece considers reshuffle if gets consensus on reforms: report
lines_and_colors: the greek prime minister is considering reshuffling his cabinet to include officials suggested by the opposition if it backs his austerity policies, kathimerini daily wrote without naming sources.
